Package es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.data.ml.features

Class Features

java.lang.Object
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.data.ml.features.Features
public class Features
extends java.lang.Object
A class for storing the set of attributes which might be used by a machine learning approach.
Author:
Javier Sanz-Cruzado (javier.sanz-cruzado@uam.es), Pablo Castells (pablo.castells@uam.es)
